properties.displayName: Potential Arbitrary Code Execution Via Node.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ((ProcessCommandLine contains " -e " or ProcessCommandLine contains " --eval ") and FolderPath endswith "\\node.exe") and (ProcessCommandLine contains ".exec(" and ProcessCommandLine contains "net.socket" and ProcessCommandLine contains ".connect" and ProcessCommandLine contains "child_process")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the execution node.exe which is shipped with multiple software such as VMware, Adobe...etc. In order to execute arbitrary code. For example to establish reverse shell as seen in Log4j attacks...
